Hi Allison,

We have checked the mobile version of the site and it seems that everything is working as it should. Most probably it is due to the cache. Could you please clear the cache of your browser and try it again?

Here is the link: https://humanswholead.com/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

Also, the testimonials weren't showing up on the mobile site at all. Is part of what you support also ensuring that the mobile version is up to spec, and is this something you can help with?
